Methods.Name: List Active Session Times
Methods.Description: Returns a list of the times that can be booked for a given program schedule type. ActiveSessionTimes represent the scheduling increments that can be booked during the active business hours for services

Methods.Name: List Client Referral Types
Methods.Description: Gets a list of referral types. Referral types are options that new clients can choose to identify how they learned about the business. Referral types are typically used for the sign-up process.

Methods.Name: List Custom Client Fields
Methods.Description: Gets collection containing custom fields.

Methods.Name: List Required Client Fields
Methods.Description: Gets collection containing all of the clients required fields.

Methods.Name: List Client Services
Methods.Description: Gets the purchased services for a specific client.

Methods.Name: List Client Indexes
Methods.Description: Client indexes are used to analyze client demographics. A business owner can set up different categories with sets of values which they can assign to each client. Client indexes are used in client searches, for tagging clients so that the owner can send mass emails to similar groups, and for many reports.

Methods.Name: List Client Contract
Methods.Description: Gets collection containing all of the clients contracts.

Methods.Name: List Client Account Balances
Methods.Description: Gets client account balances.

Methods.Name: List Client Purchases
Methods.Description: Gets a list of purchases made by a specific client.

Methods.Name: List Contact Logs
Methods.Description: Gets not just all contact logs, but also system-generated contact logs, contact logs assigned to specific staff members, and contact logs of specific types or subtypes.

Methods.Name: List Updated Client Account Balances
Methods.Description: Gets updated client account balances since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Cross Regional Client Associations
Methods.Description: Returns a list of sites that a particular client ID (also referred to as an RSSID) or a client email address is associated with in a cross-regional organization. Either the ClientID or Email parameter is required. If both are provided, the ClientID is used.

Methods.Name: Get Client By Client ID
Methods.Description: Get a client using their unique ID.

Methods.Name: List Client Visits
Methods.Description: Gets collection containing the clients visits.

Methods.Description: Gets not just all contact logs, but also system-generated contact logs, contact logs assigned to specific staff members, and contact logs of specific types or subtypes since the last run.
